00046 #ifndef __ClassMacros
00047 
00048 # define __ClassMacros
00049 
00050  //  A Class definition macros
00051 # define DefineClass(ClassName)             \
00052    class ClassName;                         \
00053    typedef ClassName    * P##ClassName;     \
00054    typedef ClassName    & R##ClassName;     \
00055    typedef P##ClassName * PP##ClassName;    \
00056    typedef P##ClassName & RP##ClassName;
00057 
00058  //  A Structure definition macros
00059 # define DefineStructure(StructureName)             \
00060    struct StructureName;                            \
00061    typedef StructureName    * P##StructureName;     \
00062    typedef StructureName    & R##StructureName;     \
00063    typedef P##StructureName * PP##StructureName;    \
00064    typedef P##StructureName & RP##StructureName;
00065 
00066 #endif

00069 #define  DefineStreamFunctions(ClassName)                              \
00070   extern void StreamWrite ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object ); \
00071   extern void StreamRead  ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object );
00072 
00073 
00074 #define  MakeStreamFunctions(ClassName)                                \
00075   void StreamWrite ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object )  {      \
00076     StreamWrite_ ( f,(mmdb::io::RPStream)Object );                     \
00077   }                                                                    \
00078   mmdb::io::PStream StreamInit##ClassName ( mmdb::io::RPStream Object ) { \
00079     return (mmdb::io::PStream)(new ClassName(Object));                 \
00080   }                                                                    \
00081   void StreamRead ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object )  {       \
00082     StreamRead_ ( f,(mmdb::io::RPStream)Object,StreamInit##ClassName );\
00083   }
00084 
00085 #define  DefineFactoryFunctions(ClassName)                             \
00086   typedef P##ClassName      Make##ClassName();                         \
00087   typedef Make##ClassName * PMake##ClassName;                          \
00088   typedef P##ClassName  StreamMake##ClassName ( mmdb::io::RPStream Object ); \
00089   P##ClassName  new##ClassName ();                                     \
00090   P##ClassName  streamNew##ClassName ( mmdb::io::RPStream Object );    \
00091   typedef StreamMake##ClassName * PStreamMake##ClassName;              \
00092   extern void SetMakers##ClassName ( void * defMk, void * streamMk );  \
00093   extern void StreamWrite ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object ); \
00094   extern void StreamRead  ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object );
00095 
00096 
00097 #define  MakeFactoryFunctions(ClassName)                               \
00098   static PMake##ClassName       make##ClassName       = NULL;          \
00099   static PStreamMake##ClassName streamMake##ClassName = NULL;          \
00100   P##ClassName new##ClassName()  {                                     \
00101     if (make##ClassName)  return (*make##ClassName)();                 \
00102                     else  return new ClassName();                      \
00103   }                                                                    \
00104   P##ClassName streamNew##ClassName ( mmdb::io::RPStream Object )  {   \
00105     if (streamMake##ClassName)                                         \
00106           return (*streamMake##ClassName)(Object);                     \
00107     else  return new ClassName(Object);                                \
00108   }                                                                    \
00109   void SetMakers##ClassName ( void * defMk, void * streamMk )  {       \
00110     make##ClassName       = PMake##ClassName(defMk);                   \
00111     streamMake##ClassName = PStreamMake##ClassName(streamMk);          \
00112   }                                                                    \
00113   void StreamWrite ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object )  {      \
00114     StreamWrite_ ( f,(mmdb::io::RPStream)Object );                     \
00115   }                                                                    \
00116   mmdb::io::PStream StreamInit##ClassName ( mmdb::io::RPStream Object ) { \
00117     return (mmdb::io::PStream)(streamNew##ClassName(Object));          \
00118   }                                                                    \
00119   void StreamRead ( mmdb::io::RFile f, RP##ClassName Object )  {       \
00120     StreamRead_ ( f,(mmdb::io::RPStream)Object,StreamInit##ClassName ); \
00121   }
00122 
00123 namespace mmdb  {
00124 
00125   namespace io  {
00126 
00127     //  ==========================  Stream  ===========================
00128 
00129     //     Each streamable class should be derived from Stream
00130     //  and have constructor Class(PStream & Object), which should
00131     //  initialize all memory of the class, and virtual functions
00132     //  read(..) and write(..) (see below). Constructor Class(PStream&)
00133     //  must not touch the Object variable. This constructor is used
00134     //  only once just before the read(..) function. It is assumed that
00135     //  read(..)/write(..) functions of the Class provide storage/reading
00136     //  of  all vital data. Function read(..) must read data in exactly
00137     //  the same way as function write(..) stores it.
00138     //     For using Class in streams, three following functions should
00139     //  be supplied:
00140     //
00141     //     1.
00142     //     void StreamWrite ( File & f, PClass & Object )  {
00143     //       StreamWrite ( f,(PStream)Object );
00144     //     }
00145     //
00146     //     2.
00147     //     PStream ClassInit ( PStream & Object )  {
00148     //       return (PStream)(new Class(Object));
00149     //     }
00150     //
00151     //     3.
00152     //     void StreamRead ( File & f, PClass & Object )  {
00153     //       StreamRead_ ( f,(PStream)Object,ClassInit );
00154     //     }
00155     //
00156     //    All these functions are automatically generated by macros
00157     //  DefineStreamFunctions(Class) -- in the header -- and
00158     //  MakeStreamFunctions(Class) -- in the implementation body. Note
00159     //  that macro DefineClass(Class) should always be issued for
00160     //  streamable classes prior to the stream-making macros. Then
00161     //  Class may be streamed using functions #1 and #3.
00162     //    StreamRead will return NULL for Object if it was not in
00163     //  the stream. If Object existed before calling StreamRead(..)
00164     //  but was not found in the stream, it will be disposed (NULL
00165     //  assigned).
00166 
00167 
00168     DefineClass(Stream);
00169     DefineStreamFunctions(Stream);
00170 
00171     class Stream  {
00172       public :
00173         Stream            ()           {}
00174         Stream            ( RPStream ) {}
00175         virtual ~Stream   ()           {}
00176         virtual void read  ( RFile )   {}
00177         virtual void write ( RFile )   {}
00178     };
00179 
00180 
00181     typedef PStream InitStreamObject(RPStream Object);
00182 
00183     extern  void StreamRead_  ( RFile f, RPStream Object,
00184                                          InitStreamObject Init );
00185 
00186     extern  void StreamWrite_ ( RFile f, RPStream Object );
00187 
00188 
00189   }
00190 
00191 }
00192 
00193 #endif
